subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jamar Taylor ran 25 yards for a touchdown, snapping a fourth-quarter tie and helping South Florida end a three-game losing streak with a 17-13 victory over visiting Connecticut.
snippet: Jamar Taylor ran 25 yards for a touchdown, snapping a fourth-quarter tie and helping South Florida end a three-game losing streak with a 17-13 victory over visiting Connecticut.
